data.title: Cerberus Agency
data.text:
Our Capabilities

Cerberus is a full-service advertising, design, web development, and media agency. Here, timely analysis and optimization of cross-platform efforts fuel an environment of constant discovery and adaptation. Our team creates effective, efficient graphic design, advertising, and marketing programs for emerging brands. Cerberus delivers Branding Worth Loving by providing the following:

CONSUMER RESEARCH & INSIGHT DEVELOPMENT

/ quantitative and qualitative research

/ psychographic target analysis

/ competitive landscape auditing

ADVERTISING DESIGN & PRODUCTION

/ creative ideation and copywriting

/ art direction, design and photography

/ motion design

/ video production and editing

SOCIAL MEDIA STRATEGY & CAMPAIGN MANAGEMENT

/ content marketing administration

/ reporting

PUBLIC RELATIONS SUPPORT

/ press releases

/ directed client outreach

BRAND STRATEGY, DESIGN & MANAGEMENT

/ brand positioning

/ brand mark and identity development

/ brand guidelines

DIGITAL DEVELOPMENT

/ user experience (UX)

/ user interface (UI)

/ search engine optimization (SEO)

/ email marketing

/ website and app development

MEDIA PLANNING, BUYING, & REPORTING

/ paid search marketing

/ ad network management

/ media optimization

Cerberus was the name of the loyal watchdog stationed by the River Styx, an ancient mythological creature of immense strength with three heads and a dragon’s tail.

Each head could see the past, present, and future with perfect clarity. Like our namesake, Cerberus’ greatest strength is our team’s ability to strip away the non-essential and provide true focus. It is this ability to provide a focused, disciplined branding process that enables Cerberus to glean insightsfrom a cluttered landscape and identify effective messaging triggers and tactics to create artful communications that drive brands forward with measurable results.

Aside from earning astounding returns on our clients’ investments over the past 14 years, Cerberus has had the honor of being globally recognized as a creative leader in the world of advertising, both offline and online.
